description: Detects linux package removal using builtin tools such as "yum", "apt", "apt-get" or "dpkg".
author: Tuan Le (NCSGroup)
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Administrator or administrator scripts might delete packages for several reasons (debugging, troubleshooting).
name: Linux Package Uninstall
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\/yum" AND process.command_line.text:("*erase*" OR "*remove*"))) OR ((process.executable.text:("*\/apt" OR "*\/apt\-get") AND process.command_line.text:("*remove*" OR "*purge*"))) OR ((process.executable.text:"*\/dpkg" AND process.command_line.text:("*\-\-remove\ *" OR "*\ \-r\ *"))) OR ((process.executable.text:"*\/rpm" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-e\ *")))
